TestCaseMetaData.name: OML Application Ack Accept
TestCaseMetaData.Description: Century Hospital's LIS transmits an 'Application Acknowledgement' message to Dr Ernst's EHR-S which indicates the OML message has been accepted.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: The OML message has been sent by the EHR-S
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Minimally populated message. Demonstrate ability to process all required data elements for the application acknowledgement test case: Minimally populated MSH Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support the minimally required data elements in the MSH segment. Minimally populated MSA Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support the minimally required data elements in the MSA segment. Minimally populated PID Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support minimally required data elements in the PID segment. Minimally populated ORC Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support minimally required data elements in the ORC segment. Minimally populated OBR Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support minimally required data elements in the OBR segment.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: This is the initial "smoke testing" to reveal simple failures of the acknowledgment message severe enough to preclude further testing.
